mapper.select: SELECT r.class_id,r.class_name,COUNT(*) num from class_newpaper cn1 RIGHT JOIN (SELECT c1.class_id,c1.class_name from classes c1 INNER JOIN classes c2 WHERE c1.parent_id = c2.class_id and c1.status = 1) r ON r.class_id = cn1.class_id GROUP BY r.class_name
mapper.update: update classes set class_name = #{class_name} where class_id = #{class_id} and status = 1
update classes set status = 0 where class_id = #{class_id}
